name: Wells Fargo & Company
summary: Wells Fargo & Company is an American multinational financial services company and one of the 'Big Four' banks in the United States. Founded in 1852, it provides a wide range of banking, investment, mortgage, and financial services to over 70 million customers worldwide, operating in 35 countries. It is headquartered in San Francisco and is consistently ranked among the largest banks by assets and market capitalization.
